title: How does one become a good teacher at university? - Quora

response.answer_text: Communication is the most important part of teaching. From experience i have noticed how so many Teachers fail to get the message across. Teaching is public speaking in short. One needs to prepare the content before hand and know what the mindset of the audience is. Also application of different methods should be encouraged. Conventional teaching involves a teacher and a blackboard and a text book. Waste of time. A teacher needs to hammer in the key aspects of the content being taught.

A good teacher in my opinion is one who understand their students and connect with them. My teacher while teaching use to involve us in the decision. He use to ask us how who why when type of question and use to listen to us and correct plus encourages us to try to answer. Then he should to teach us and tell the appropriate answer. In between he use to entertain us in a well disciplined way. So to be a good teacher you need to connect with student and make them connect to you and the subject . Try to motivate student and sometime give them motivational lecture. I hope the answer may help u...
By not being lazy when assessing your students formally. And don't sleep with the students whenever they fail their examinations.
